table.name: vtiger_vehicules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vehicules` ( `vehiculesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `vehicule_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `calcolor` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `vehicule_registration` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `isrented` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `vehicule_type` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vehiculesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_vehiculescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vehiculescf` ( `vehiculesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vehiculesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
